Terminals/Media Computers

Terminals (media computers) require a unique identifier/key to be used by your media library; you can automatically connect a terminal when installing it, this option can be disabled on the settings page.

Generate Configuration File

You can download a configuration file for a media computer and simply drop it in the folder of the Uber Media server application e.g. "C:\Program Files\Ubermeat\Media"; you may need to change the database connection settings!
